On Nov 12, 2006, at 7:44 PM, Gregory J. Ward wrote:


> OK, fine.  I added a "-s auto" specification to set the maximum to  
> the penultimate foveal maximum as reported by the "phisto"  
> command.  I didn't make it the default, because it takes a bit  
> longer to compute that way.


Even better than a simple max scale; much better, in fact.  As usual,  
you've improved on the idea and, more importantly, executed.  Thanks,  
Greg. Looking forward to grabbing it up tomorrow.
